typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		ENCUESTA as string,
		EMPRESA as string,
		NUMERO_SERVICIO as string,
		NOMBRE_SERVICIO as string,
		NUMERO_TRAMITE as string,
		FECHA_INGRESO as timestamp,
		FECHA_CIERRE_TRAMITE as timestamp,
		PERIODO_ANNO as integer,
		PERIODO_MES as integer,
		TELEFONO as string,
		CORREO_ELECTRONICO as string,
		CANAL_INGRESO as string,
		OFICINA as string,
		ZONA_OFICINA as string,
		ZONA as string,
		COMUNA as string,
		RURALIDAD as string,
		TIPO_INGRESO as string,
		SUBTIPO_INGRESO as string,
		ATENCION_BRIGADA as string,
		SUCURSAL as string,
		EJECUTIVO as string,
		ESTADO_RESOLUCION as string,
		CLASIFICACION as string,
		TIPO_RESOLUCION as string,
		BRIGADA as string,
		TIPO_CORTE as string,
		COMUNA_ID as string,
		FECHA_EJECUCION as timestamp
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	enableCdc: true,
	mode: 'read',
	skipInitialLoad: false,
	waterMarkColumn: 'FECHA_EJECUCION',
	batchSize: 1000,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> casa
casa sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	format: 'document',
	batchSize: 1000,
	partitionKey: ['/idEncuesta'],
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	mapColumn(
		ENCUESTA,
		EMPRESA,
		NUMERO_SERVICIO,
		NOMBRE_SERVICIO,
		NUMERO_TRAMITE,
		FECHA_INGRESO,
		FECHA_CIERRE_TRAMITE,
		PERIODO_ANNO,
		PERIODO_MES,
		TELEFONO,
		CORREO_ELECTRONICO,
		CANAL_INGRESO,
		OFICINA,
		ZONA_OFICINA,
		ZONA,
		COMUNA,
		RURALIDAD,
		TIPO_INGRESO,
		SUBTIPO_INGRESO,
		ATENCION_BRIGADA,
		SUCURSAL,
		EJECUTIVO,
		ESTADO_RESOLUCION,
		CLASIFICACION,
		TIPO_RESOLUCION,
		BRIGADA,
		TIPO_CORTE,
		COMUNA_ID,
		FECHA_EJECUCION
	)) ~> salida
